title: An elegant approach for the synthesis of multisubstituted imidazole via FeCl3/SiO2 catalyzed activation of acetals: a photophysical study of an imidazole–carbazole hybrid
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,33512-33523
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA06436D, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Barnali Das, Arghyadeep Bhattacharyya, Bhaswati Paul, Ramalingam Natarajan, Swapan Majumdar
Here, synthesis of substituted imidazoles from benzil, protected carbonyl and NH4OAc/primary amine in the presence of a FeCl3/SiO2 catalyst is reported. The photophysical property of the synthesized imidazole–carbazole hybrid is also investigated.
